welcome_message_body: "Welcome to El Quetzal! This vibrant city is known for its rich history and charming streets. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that El Quetzal has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Coatepeque Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Coatepeque Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Base Aerea Del Sur Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal handles all freight and cargo shipments at Base Aerea Del Sur Airport.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and requires a password for access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Quetzaltenango Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers to use.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
